posts.post_content:
This is the only card with a discard ability that I can find that does NOT have "Play this ability only when you can play a sorcery."
  
   
5 stars for instant-speed discard.
posts.html:
This is the only card with a discard ability that I can find that does NOT have "Play this ability only when you can play a sorcery."

5 stars for instant-speed discard.

Posted By: Pantheon (12/22/2009 8:31:55 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Most have that ability "Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery" because it would be incredibly annoying to be locked out of play because an opponent forces you to discard the only card you have after your draw step. This one can only do that once before it has to flip.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: The thing i love about this card is that after he becomes flipped, you want him to flip. You spend a large amount of mana and turns forcing your opponent to discard, and after his last card is gone you get to put a very fast clock on him. Perfectly designed card if you ask me.

posts.post_content: If they spend removal on him, they spent a useful kill spell to kill your 2-drop. Better than it hitting your finisher. And even if they spend removal on it after getting hit with the discard ability, they still get 2-for-1'd. A quality black 2-drop. Pre-Bob, of course.
